Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 2 % of the alleles in this study .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cystic fibrosis |
| Hemophilia |
| Duchenne muscular dystrophy |

The paragraph mentions "Cystic fibrosis, Hemophilia, and Duchenne muscular dystrophy" as examples of genetic disorders caused by recessive alleles. These are the disease entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cystic fibrosis |
| Hemophilia |
| Duchenne muscular dystrophy |

The paragraph mentions "Cystic fibrosis, Hemophilia, and Duchenne muscular dystrophy" as examples of genetic disorders caused by recessive alleles. These are the disease entities in the paragraph. The other entities such as "2% of the alleles" and "this study" do not clearly refer to diseases.
